str.o: This module pretty prints a list of files.
The directory list template is not the same as the default template, but the default template is used. This might be a residue from an old configuration file, or intentional.
If one of these files is present in a directory, it will be returned instead of the directory listing.
If this variable is set, you can get a listing of all files in a directory by appending '.' to the directory name. It is very useful for debugging, but some people regard it as a security hole.
If true, use the default directory layout template
The template for directory list generation.
